content:
From: "C. Diekmann" <diekmann@net.in.tum.de>
Howdy fellow Isabelle users,

Isabelle creates by default okayish-looking LaTeX proof documents. Adding
some colors and some typesetting which helps to better distinguish
definition names from definition arguments would be nice. Some style
similar to the browser info would be awesome. Does anyone have examples for
some nicer-looking setups?

Thanks!
Cornelius
